thread.section_title: Olive Oil Lovers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Olive Oil Lovers | oliveoillovers.com
thread.title: Andrew Gifford
thread.title_full: Olive Oil Lovers reviewed by Andrew Gifford

author: Andrew Gifford
title: Andrew Gifford
text: Since moving back to US after 13 years living in Italy we have been struggling to find GOOD quality REAL Italian olive oil and we finally have, without breaking the bank :) The minute I opened the container and smelt then aroma of the oil I knew it was the real thing. The taste is just peppery enough, it compliments our salads, veggies and seafood perfectly. And it arrived ahead of schedule. We will be ordering more.
